attributes.action: Orchestrate the removal of the bridge tolls on the Forth and Tay Bridges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the people of Fife have to bear the toll charges on the Tay and Forth Bridges. As does anyone visiting the Kingdom. We urge the Government to orchestrate the removal of these tolls.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
